name: Cockroach Agency
description:
Long time ago, there was a scientist who has failed in an experiment, the gas spread all over the place.
There was a cockroach who breathed from the gas.
The gas made him smart, now he needs sugar to survive.
Help this cockroach to collect sugar from houses
but watch out from spray cans and legs from squashing you!

Game modes: single, two players, bonus level.

There's an included readme file, read it for more information
